definition: abbr. for Uighur 維吾爾|维吾尔[Wei2 wu2 er3]/surname Wei
to preserve/to maintain/to hold together/dimension/vitamin (abbr. for 維生素|维生素[wei2 sheng1 su4])

white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera

sentences.english: Conclusion FG is the adhesive which can greatly decrease the rate of adhesion.
sentences.chinese: 結論纖維蛋白膠可有效降低腹腔術後粘連發生率。

sentences.english: Also, the subject invention provides a fibrin-specific monoclonal antibody.
sentences.chinese: 本發明還提供一種纖維蛋白特異性的單克隆抗體。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the role of plasmatic fibrinogen in the pathogenesis of coronary heart disease (CHD).
sentences.chinese: 目的探討血漿纖維蛋白原在冠心病發病中的作用。

sentences.english: Plasma fibrinogen levels were assayed by tissue thromboplastin.
sentences.chinese: 採用組織凝血活酶法測定血漿纖維蛋白原水平。

sentences.english: Keratin is a tough, fibrous protein found in hair and nails.
sentences.chinese: 角質是一種硬纖維蛋白，在頭髮和指甲中都存在。

sentences.english: But in the morning, the activity of our fibrinolytic system is reduced.
sentences.chinese: 但是早晨，我們的纖維蛋白溶解系統的活動減少了。

sentences.english: It is suggested that fibrinogen in plasma takes an important role in the the pathogenesis of CHD.
sentences.chinese: 血漿纖維蛋白原在冠心病的發病中可能起重要作用。

sentences.english: The D-Dimer and E fragment are degradation products of cross-linked fibrin.
sentences.chinese: 雙聚體和E片段均爲交聯型纖維蛋白的降解產物。

sentences.english: The local accumulation of fibrin and platelets is known as a hemostatic plug.
sentences.chinese: 纖維蛋白和血小板的聚集稱爲止血塞。

sentences.english: Biochemical characterization of these enzymes showed they also exhibited both in vitro fibrinogen-clotting and arginine-esterase activities.
sentences.chinese: 兩種酶都具有精氨酸酯酶活性和纖維蛋白原凝結活性。

sentences.english: There was no correlation between blood uric acid and fibrinogen.
sentences.chinese: 血尿酸和血漿纖維蛋白原二者間無相關性。

sentences.english: Objective To establish a method for kinetic measurement of human fibrinolysis function.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立動態檢測人纖維蛋白溶解功能的方法。

sentences.english: Objective To research the therapeutic ef fe cts of alkaline electrolytic water on antioxidation and antagonism of fibrinogen .
sentences.chinese: 目的探討鹼性電解水抗氧化及抗纖維蛋白原的作用。

sentences.english: A normal ongoing process that dissolves fibrin and results in the removal of small blood clots.
sentences.chinese: 溶解血纖維蛋白併除去小的血液凝塊的正常過程。

sentences.english: They were tested for plasma fibrinogen level right after admitted to hospital.
sentences.chinese: 入院後檢測血漿纖維蛋白原水平。

sentences.english: The anticoagulant and fibrinolytic effects of the total glucosides of Chi-Shao(Paeonia Iactifora)in rats were studied.
sentences.chinese: 本文報道赤芍總甙對大鼠的抗凝和纖維蛋白溶解作用。

pinyin: dong4 mai4 zhou1 yang4 ying4 hua4

definition: histamine (a biogenic amine involved in local immune responses)
thyroid hormone/thyroxine (used to treat underactive thyroid)
